resources.string: Type the input type of your search.
Type a keyword to search for the poetry information.

1) If you choose input type = "author", then type some keywords of the author name in the second blank. 2) If you choose input type = "title", then type some keywords of the poetry\'s title in the second blank. 3) If you choose input type = "lines", then type some keywords of the lines of the poetry in the second blank. 4)ã€€If you choose input type = "random", then type a random number in the second blank.
